data.message:
everyone screaming fuck trump! 
everyone screaming i'm no longer a Eminem fan!
everyone screaming i'm a Eminem fan till i die 
everyone screaming WHEN IS THE NEW ALBUM DROPPING

but aint nobody screaming 
That this eminem is a fake 
he is merely a shitty replica of the real Eminem! 

he is literally just a copy of the real thing

his body language, the way he answers to "Eminem''  his eye movements are all over the shop like his barely home and then his tweeking over nothing and then his looking around at the camera awkwardly, his answers are literally one liners ! 

one of the biggest slickest talking celebrities on planet fucking earth and he looks like he gets put on the spot every time he answers something and only manages to never get more then a phrase out 

 puppet of MK Ultra much !!! 

STAY WOKE !
